config.mccic-music.hitw_sound_on_other_d: Hole in the Wall Death Sound
The sound to play when other players are eliminated in Hole in the Wall. Emulates event behavior. Changing this option will preview the sound, only when on MCC: Island.
config.mccic-music.stop_music_on_death.t: Whether or not the music is stopped on death in certain game modes. The music will resume on respawn.
config.mccic-music.stop_music_on_chicken: Whether or not the music is stopped when whacking a chicken in TGTTOS.
config.mccic-music.transition_to_overtim: Whether or not the music transitions to the overtime music near the end of a game round. Disable if server lag is causing this to sound off.
